page.title: 09Forestry in our Area
page.content: In our Domesday area there are a lot of trees.They are mainly conifers but there are some decidious trees aswell. During World War One one third of our trees were cut down leaving two thirds ,but in World War Two another third of our trees were cut down leaving only one third.After the two World Wars, Mr.Matheson,the Laird of Brahan Estate ,planted more trees so that we now have a large area of forest.To start off Mr.Matheson and his workers planted one stand of trees to try them out.After about thirty years Mr.Matheson goes out to thin the plantation.About ten years ago Mr.Matheson stopped planting trees. Mr.Matheson has lots of plans for our forests.He plans to make walks through the forests.The main deciduous trees he grows are Oak,Ash and Birch ,while the main conifers are Scots Pine.
